She n__ only ho___ a sh__, b__ also h__ a maga____, cook_____, a__ is frequ_____ a gu___ on ot___ shows. Despite a brief stay in prison for financial crimes, she is still well respected figure in American media.
data.fullContent: Martha Stewart has built an empire based on a homemade and crafty lifestyle. She not only hosts a show, but also has a magazine, cookbooks, and is frequently a guest on other shows. Despite a brief stay in prison for financial crimes, she is still well respected figure in American media.
data.answer: 玛莎·斯图尔特(Martha Stewart)建立了一个以自制和狡黠的生活方式为基础的帝国。她不仅主持一档节目，还拥有一本杂志、厨具商品，还经常在其他节目中客串。尽管她曾因金融犯罪而短暂入狱，但她在美国媒体中仍是备受尊敬的人物。
